website_summaries.verdict: Dressy enough for work, casual enough for jeans, this classic loafer will take you anywhere, all day long, in comfort and style.
pros: Great for those who are on their feet all day
Comes in black, cordovan, and rust
cons: May run large, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent shoe. The quality is extremely high. This would be my go to shoe for office, as well as to go to friend's places (because the shoe is easy to take on and off, and looks great). The quality of leather is top notch. After 1 year of use, they are still new. Quality is way higher compared to Allen Edmonds.
customer_reviews.author: Pankaj Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 9 first but the shoes were too big. We had to return. He's never worn Mephisto before. Now 8,5 fits perfect. He loves it. He said very comfortable. Beautiful shoes. The color is nice too, dark brown with reddish tint. Probably will order different color !
customer_reviews.author: AzDo

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful to look at and well made with quality materials
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to find shoes that fit my feet. Somehow these Mephisto shoes work for me. They are beautiful to look at and well made with quality materials. They are light weight and should be easy to care for. The customer service I received from the vender was exceptional. I intend to wear these only for meetings and special occasions but I am sure I could wear these all day if I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: ronald kamish

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto's are the best feeling shoes right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Cap Vert slip-on's. Made a mistake on the first set as they are at least a 1/2 a size larger than my normal size shoes. This was a bit of problem with the first pair, but because I opted for a half size smaller the new shoes fit like a glove. Although Mephisto's are on the pricey side, the comfort and wear make up for the price. I also like that I can send them back for refurbishment. Great casual shoe that can be worn for hours on end in great comfort.
customer_reviews.author: BadgerDan

customer_reviews.title: The best loafers I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are expensive but worth every penny. I bought my last pair of Mephisto Cap Vert loafers more twenty years ago. Every four or five years I send them back to Mephisto to be refurbished (soles, heels, inner base, resewn seams and refinished leather.) They come back looking like new for a very reasonable cost. I recently lost 60 lbs and my shoes were too loose so I ordered a new pair a size smaller and they fit perfectly and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Fast Reader

customer_reviews.title: Make not fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same size as a previous pair. The only difference was the color. They are much tighter that the first pair. Weird because I have the boating shoe with same type of sole / simulator shoe and it fits fine
customer_reviews.author: Robert Plaisance

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto shoes
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Mephisto shoes and first Cap Vert Slip-on. They fit fine, look great and very pleased. Haven’t worn but once, so can’t comment on durability.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGonnell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, buyer beware costly return
customer_reviews.text: Always, always wear size 8. Some reviews said to order 1/2 size smaller, some said size was correct. In my case needed 1/2 size smaller. Have always had great customer service from Amazon, but it turns out shoes.com requires you to return at your own expense. Size clearly does not run true, but shoes.com is putting that problem on the customer. These are very comfortable & have always seen good quality with Mephisto. Love Amazon - shoes.com, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G McCabe

customer_reviews.title: decided to keep the shoes
customer_reviews.text: At 1st I thought a 10 was just a tad large but after wearing around the house I have decided that a size smaller 91/2 would be to small
customer_reviews.author: robert j coffey

customer_reviews.title: so far total satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: took a chance on mephisto even though i had never tried them on. they are very comfortable and they have a good business/casual look. obviously not a suit shoe but trousers and dress shirt are good with these. they do feel a tad on the larger/wider side. i will look for a slightly thicker sock. quality definitely seems to be there. I have only had these for about 3 weeks. will update later if anything worth posting.
customer_reviews.author: PH 95762

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I have these in every color. Love them. So soft. Comfortable. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: MJS115

customer_reviews.title: Worn to death!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes and every pair he purchases he wears and wears until they look very old and tired. So, I bought him a replacement pair which he carefully put away in his closet and takes out for special occasions and still wears his old pair every day. They are so well-made and such a classic style. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Willa Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Mephistos are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My feet are wide, relatively flat, and I require a soft shoe to be comfortable. This is my second pair of these specific shoes; the first lasted several years of almost daily wear, through a resoling, and are still worn when scuffs are not important. The price of Mephisto shoes always causes a sharp intake of breath but then you slip them on and the comfort is suddenly worth every penny of the price.
customer_reviews.author: pnc

customer_reviews.title: I have flat feet and a bad back and unfortunately I will have to return as ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely runs a half size large but narrow at the toes. I have flat feet and a bad back and unfortunately I will have to return as Mephisto shoes just don't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: FGR

customer_reviews.title: Comfort comes first.
customer_reviews.text: They are the only shoes that my husband can wear without suffering ! My only wish is that they had a sale once in a while. They are expensive in our retirement world.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie l rohrer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and workmanship. This is my second pair. Only negative is shoe fits perfectly if left foot while it is slightly loose on right foot. Will require some modification
customer_reviews.author: Madhu N.

customer_reviews.title: Superior Comfort
customer_reviews.text: These may seem pricey -but the quallity is first rate and the comfort is too. I've gone around the world six times with these on, and these are great looking and super comfortable too. Great style that doesn't look "earth shoe'ish" but modern classic penny-style loafter ...
customer_reviews.author: Jam-i

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a half size too long and a full size in width. Order a half size shorter than usual and wear thick socks! I could tell they would have been very comfortable in the right size.
customer_reviews.author: doc sjc

customer_reviews.title: A fine shoe that lasts
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what Mephisto always offers. While they used to recommend a tight fit, I prefer a half-size up to keep my feet cooler in the summer. I've also just used their reconditioning service (about $90) on an older pair of these and they came back looking like new.
customer_reviews.author: RET

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. Expensive but incredibly comfortable, and they last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Elektratig.

customer_reviews.title: WORKING ON A PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: LEFT SHOE IS PERFECT..RIGHT SHOE IS TIGHT.NOT THE SHOES FAULT. LIKE SOME PEOPLE MY RIGHT FOOT IS WIDER SO I AM STRETCHING THE SHOE WITH A LARGER SHOE TREE.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: As with any Mephisto shoe, this one has the benefits of high quality construction and fabulous comfort. I own many Mephisto shoes and the worst part of them is they destroy the rest of the shoes in the closet. When it comes to selecting which ones to wear, the Mephisto shoes always make the cut.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes

customer_reviews.text: Either my feet are getting smaller or a well made shoe fits differently. Well made, but very over-priced in my view.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, comfort, comfort
customer_reviews.text: I wear these at work and they are really comfortable. I cut the tag off though so it would look more like a dress shoe versus casual.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love Mephisto shoes - and these are no exception - comfortable right out of the box. They do run large, like the description says, so go at least a half size smaller. These shoes are a nice hydrid - casual enough for wearing around town in jeans, but dressy enough to wear with a jacket and tie to dinner. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: K-Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stylish. Bought same shoe (tan color) five years ago and still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Men's Loafers
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. This purchase is my 4th or 5th pair. I am very tough on shoes and appreciate the wear I get from these.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Halpert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Mephisto Cap Vert shoes are very comfortable, and perfect for business casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Evans

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find until Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous quality. Comfortable from the minute you put them on and will last a life time.

customer_reviews.title: VERSATILE STYLISH $CONFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I teach all day and Im on my feet these shoes go well with tan pants or blue jeans. With out changing on the way home I can stop in at the local golf club for a meeting and still have the same "smart" look while being casual.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are good from the start
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are good from the start, look great, and can be left out in the rain without ruining them. I bought my first pair when walking around in Venice, Italy to replace inferior shoes that fell apart while on the trip. It seemed like too much money at the time, but it has worked out great. It turns out they are really a bargain. That was three years ago, and I still wear the same shoes several times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. The color is great. The fit is perfect and it is the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn.

customer_reviews.title: The insole conforms to your foot over time just like a glove
customer_reviews.text: The insole conforms to your foot over time just like a glove. These shoes are excellent if you have "challenged" feet. Love them!

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes and I will buy more
customer_reviews.text: I own 14 pair of this style shoe and now have 4 in to recondition. These are great shoes and I will buy more. The last dark pair are a little loose but I think I can live with
customer_reviews.author: Donald Morrissette

product_meta.title: Mephisto Men's Cap Vert Slip-On
product_meta.description:
Comfort dress shoes

Mephisto makes some of the finest walking shoes on earth. Their comfort, support and durability are recognized wherever people are serious about walking. For more than three decades, Mephisto has been on the forefront of walking-shoe innovation. Mephisto's natural products are handmade of leather, latex, cork and rubber.
feature_bullets: Natural rubber outer-soles and Spinnaker insoles add shock absorbency
